en: Unsealed golden letters scattered across the floor.
zh_TW: 開封的金色信封散落一地。

en: They seem to be rituals with various titles.
zh_TW: 看起來是有著多種名稱的儀式。

en: This is the one I did...
These all come in golden letters... do they all work?
zh_TW: 它們都裝在金色的信封中…它們都是真的嗎？

en: I should look into this when I get home.
It's too dark to see anything on the other side.
zh_TW: 暗到沒辦法看到另一側。

en: Now that you can prove that these rituals work, you have no way of going back to tell anyone.
zh_TW: 既然妳證明了這個儀式是真的，那麼妳也會無法回去告訴任何人。

en: The knowledge will die with you.
You're just trying to scare me.
The door is stuck. It won't open.
zh_TW: 門被卡住了。沒辦法打開。
